text: Avigdor Moskowitz (born 4 February 1953) is a former Israeli basketball player, playing as a point guard. He was a member of the Israeli team, which had won a gold medal at 1974 Asian Games after defeating South Korea 92–85 in a final match. He represented his country four times in the European Championships and in 1979 he won a silver medal. == References == Category:Israeli basketball players Category:Medalists at the 1974 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Israel Category:Asian Games medalists in basketball Category:Basketball players at the 1974 Asian Games Category:1953 births Category:Living people
title: Avigdor Moskowitz
